amendment.description: To establish the Foundation for Energy Security and Innovation.

vote.text: Amendment SA 1588, under the order of 5/25/21, having achieved 60 votes in the affirmative, was agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 83 - 14. Record Vote Number: 210.

action.text: Amendment SA 1588 proposed by Senator Coons to Amendment SA 1502. (consideration: CR S3492-3493; text: CR S3121-3124) To establish the Foundation for Energy Security and Innovation.

Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Amendment SA 1588, under the order of 5/25/21, having achieved 60 votes in the affirmative, was agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 83 - 14. Record Vote Number: 210.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1588 proposed by Senator Coons to Amendment SA 1502.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 1588, under the order of 5/25/21, having achieved 60 votes in the affirmative, was agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 83 - 14. Record Vote Number: 210.
